title: AWS Resource Access Manager
description:
This short demo shows how you can use AWS Resource Access Manager (RAM) to share your resources with any AWS account or through AWS Organizations. If you have many AWS accounts, you can create a resource centrally and share it with multiple accounts.

Learn more about AWS RAM at - https://go.aws/2NajTU4
